== Configuration ==
Open _pichi.xml_ and modify config.

Jabber server configuration:
{{{
<option Name="server" type="string">*JABBER_SERVER*</option>
<option Name="port" type="int">*5222*</option>
<option Name="room" type="string">*ROOM*@conference.*JABBER_SERVER*</option>
<option Name="db_file" type="string">*pichi.db*</option>
}}}

User configuration:
{{{
<option Name="user" type="string">USER_NAME</option>
<option Name="room_user" type="string">USER_NAME_IN_ROOM</option>
<option Name="password" type="string">PASSWORD</option>
<option Name="resource" type="string">SIMPLE_RESOURCE</option>
<option Name="status" type="string">STATUS</option>
}}}

And enjoy ;)
